name: Football Run
description:
A Student game made in Unity. 

2 v 2 Football. Pick up the ball and run for the goal! 

Having the ball stolen from you makes you stop for a brief period. 

Student Learned: 

• Unity Animator

• Simple AI (Move toward a target depending on state)

• Saving data

• Resetting the game

• Some 3D modeling (football and goal post)
